meanings.definition: Tell (someone) the same story or information again.
meanings.sent1: She retells the story to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He often retells his favorite childhood memories.
meanings.sent3: Grandma always retells the same jokes at family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The history book retells the events of the past in vivid detail.
meanings.sent5: The documentary retells the life of a famous artist through interviews and footage.

meanings.definition: To tell a story or describe an event to someone in a different way.
meanings.sent1: The author retells the fairy tale with a modern twist.
meanings.sent2: The teacher retells the lesson using different examples.
meanings.sent3: The comedian retells the news in a hilarious manner.
meanings.sent4: The movie retells history through the eyes of a fictional character.
meanings.sent5: The explorer retells his adventures in a captivating manner.
